name: DevStars Ltd
description:
Devstars Ltd is a small team of hardworking enthusiastic developers founded in 2003, who believe in pushing boundaries and delivering a quality friendly service to our clients. They are based in London. Our teams will take the time they need to observe, research and understand the problems we are solving and the people we are designing for. We will take your sketches, ideas and napkins, and turn them into a reality.
A series of in-depth workshops to allow our teams to gather a collaborative specification of works ahead, chemistry sessions, understanding of commercial objectives and full project scoping.
READ MORE...
